original_text: And the inhabited cities shall be laid waste, and the land shall become a desolation; and you shall know that I am the Lord.”
korean_text: 사람이 거주하는 성읍들이 황폐하며 땅이 적막하리니 내가 여호와인 줄을 너희가 알리라 하셨다 하라

sentences.original_text: And the inhabited cities shall be laid waste
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 사람 사는 성들은 황폐해질 것이며

sentences.original_text: and the land shall become a desolation
